column2: We are seeking a talented and motivated BPO (Business Process Outsourcing) Executive to join our team at DAULAT PRIDE INDIA PRIVATE LIMITED. The BPO Executive will play a crucial role in ensuring efficient communication and coordination between our company and external stakeholders. The ideal candidate will possess excellent communication skills, attention to detail, and a passion for delivering exceptional customer service. Roles & Responsibilities    Customer Support: ?Provide prompt and courteous assistance to customers via phone, email, and other communication channels. Address inquiries, resolve complaints, and escalate issues as needed to ensure customer satisfaction.   Order Processing: ?Process orders accurately and efficiently, ensuring timely delivery of products to customers. Coordinate with internal departments such as sales, logistics, and inventory management to fulfil orders and resolve any discrepancies.   Data Management: ?Maintain accurate records of customer interactions, transactions, and inquiries using our CRM (Customer Relationship Management) system. Compile and analyse data to identify trends, track performance metrics, and generate reports for management review.   Troubleshooting: ?Troubleshoot technical issues related to product usage, delivery, or online platforms. Collaborate with technical support teams or third-party vendors to resolve issues and ensure a seamless customer experience.   Quality Assurance: ?Conduct regular quality assurance checks on customer interactions and processes to uphold company standards and compliance requirements. Identify areas for improvement and implement corrective actions to enhance efficiency and effectiveness.   Relationship Management: ?Cultivate positive relationships with customers, vendors, and other external partners to foster loyalty and collaboration. Proactively communicate updates, promotions, and product information to stakeholders to drive engagement and sales.   Training and Development: ?Stay informed about Daulat Pride's products, policies, and procedures through ongoing training and professional development activities. Share knowledge and best practices with team members to enhance overall performance and productivity. Qualifications:  Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Communication, or a related field.  Proven experience in a customer service or BPO role, preferably within the FMCG industry.  Excellent communication skills, both verbal and written, with a customer-centric approach.  Strong organizational skills and attention to detail, with the ability to multitask and prioritize workload effectively.  Proficiency in using CRM software, Microsoft Office suite, and other relevant tools.  Problem-solving abilities and a proactive attitude towards addressing customer needs and resolving issues.  Ability to work collaboratively in a fast-paced environment and adapt to changing priorities and demands. Interested candidates can share the updated resume with us on  hrdaulatpride@gmail.com  along with subject line of BPO Executive. In the mail mention details of current salary, expected salary and notice period mentioned.

column2: Role & responsibilities     Ensure immediate response to all customer queries and concerns across all platforms including Calls, WhatsApp, Social Media, Google, Zomato/Swiggy, Email, SMS, and more. Actively address all customer concerns, ensuring they remain loyal patrons of our brands. Proactively address customer complaints and concerns. Make daily feedback calls to customers who visited (dined / took-out) the previous day, ensuring their concerns are resolved. Resolve complaints received during these calls and ensure customer satisfaction. Ensure all customer interactions are courteous and professional, and that no guest queries go unanswered. Monitor customer interactions to ensure a high standard of customer service. Preferred candidate profile   Must have experience in both outbound and inbound customer service Must have experience in both Voice and Non-Voice customer service process Must have handled customer queries and complaints Must have experience working in B2C or Hotel or Restaurant Chain

column2: Introduction: At Trident Outsourcing Services, we believe in satisfying the needs of our customers. We do so, by making all channels of communication open for our clients and helping them discover essential products/services from the comfort of their homes. That is why we are seeking a highly skilled telesales executive. By bridging the gap between the customers and the company, the work of a telesales executive involves having telephonic conversations with the customers, while hitting the sales targets of the company. Going the extra mile for the customer is a vital part of the role of the telesales executive. With an in-depth knowledge of the company offerings, the ideal tele sales executive works towards building a strong relationship with customers, by making telephonic sales. Objectives of this role: 1) Meet weekly/monthly sales targets by developing a marketing strategy as a telesales executive. 2)Gain a deep understanding of the companys services and find gaps in the customers lives wherein the companys services fit.  3)Foster strong relationships with existing and potential customers by honing the telesales executive skills such as listening, empathy and problem-solving. 4)Comply with the rules and regulations of the company by providing customer support as a telemarketing executive. Responsibilities: 1)Convert leads for the company through telephonic conversations. 2)Maintain and monitor the records of all the conversations, be it customer feedback, purchase orders or queries. 3)Stick to the sales script and strategy, but also improvise it when needed, within the scope of the telesales executive job role. 4)Update customers about new launches and record customer reactions to new products  Be aware of the latest industry trends as a telesales executive. 5)Liaise with the concerned department regarding customer queries and complaints.  Required skills and qualifications:  1) High school diploma 2)Prior experience working as a telesales executive or in a similar role.    3) Fluency in English  4)Adept knowledge of working with MS Office   5) Great communication skills, both verbal and written Preferred skills and qualifications:  1) Bachelors degree in communication, marketing, or a similar discipline. 2)Proven record of meeting sales targets.  3) Outstanding negotiation and time management skil ls.

Issue Resolution:  Resolving customer issues, complaints, or concerns in a timely and satisfactory manner to ensure a positive customer experience. 3.  Communication Skills:  Demonstrating excellent verbal and written communication skills to interact with customers professionally and effectively. 4.  Product/Service Knowledge:  Maintaining a deep understanding of the company's products or services to provide accurate information and assistance to customers. 5.  Order Processing:  Handling order-related tasks, including order placement, tracking, cancellations, and addressing any issues related to the ordering process. 6.  Technical Support:  Providing basic technical support or troubleshooting assistance to customers, or escalating technical issues to the appropriate teams. 7.  Customer Education:  Educating customers about product features, service offerings, and providing guidance on how to make the best use of the products or services. 8.  Feedback Collection:  Collecting customer feedback, suggestions, and complaints to help the company understand customer needs and areas for improvement. 9.  Record Keeping:  Maintaining accurate records of customer interactions, feedback, and relevant details to track customer history and aid in future interactions. 10.  Adherence to Policies:  Adhering to company policies and procedures, ensuring that all interactions with customers align with the organization's standards and values. column2: As a Telesales Executive, you will be responsible for generating sales leads, pitching our products or services to potential clients over the phone, and maintaining good customer relationships. You will play a key role in contributing to the company's revenue growth by meeting and exceeding sales targets. Responsibilities: Conduct outbound calls to prospective customers using provided leads and databases. Present, promote, and sell products/services to existing and prospective customers. Reach out to potential customers to inform them about our products or services using scripts. Answer questions about products or the company. Close sales and achieve quarterly quotas. Document and update customer records in the company's database. Collaborate with the sales team to identify and grow opportunities within the territory. Follow up on leads generated by marketing campaigns. Build and maintain strong, long-lasting customer relationships. Handle customer inquiries and resolve issues promptly and professionally. Requirements: Proven experience as a telesales representative or other sales/customer service role. Proven track record of successfully meeting sales quotas preferably over the phone. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills. Ability to learn about products and services and describe/explain them to prospects. Proficient in MS Office and CRM software (e.g., Salesforce). Excellent negotiation and persuasion skills. Ability to work well in a team environment. High school diploma; additional certification in sales or marketing is a plus. Benefits: Competitive salary with commission-based incentives. Comprehensive training and ongoing support. Opportunities for career advancement. Health insurance and other benefits package. Friendly and collaborative work environment. Role & responsibilities   Preferred candidate profile   Perks and benefits

column2: Role & responsibilities     Provides customer support by phone, email or instant message to consumers. Serves as primary contact for inbound customer issues. Escalates more technical product-related issues to proper Product Support department. ??Processes a high volume of consumer inquiries of FIS products and services and resolves a targeted percentage of those inquiries. ??Troubleshoots customer problems, identifies root cause of problem and uses tool and resources appropriately to determine how to resolve customer problems. ??When unable to resolve problems in a reasonable amount of time, will escalate to appropriate resource. Follows up on escalated issues with coaching and mentoring to learn appropriate solution and expand overall knowledge. ??Tracks and documents inbound support requests and ensures proper notation of customer problems or issues. ??Updates customer information and ensures accurate entry of contact information. ??Meets standards of job, such as quality standards, adherence to schedule and average handle time. ??May provide guidance and/or mentoring to less experienced Customer Service Associates - Consumer. ??Other related duties assigned as needed. EDUCATION REQUIREMENTS High school diploma or GED GENERAL KNOWLEDGE, SKILLS & ABILITIES ??Knowledge of the companys products, services and business operations to enable resolution of customer inquiries ??Excellent customer service skills that build high levels of customer satisfaction ??Excellent verbal and written communication skills ??Computer navigation and operation skills ??Demonstrates effective people skills and sensitivities when dealing with others ??Ability to work both independently and in a team environment  Preferred candidate profile    Developing support role. Moderate skills with high level of proficiency. Responds to a high volume of inquiries about FISs products and services. Questions and issues are predominantly routine but associate must be able to deviate from standard scripts and procedures as needed. Is able to effectively calm upset customers and end a negative situation positively. May coach and share information with professionals with less experience and/or expertise. Works under close to general supervision with little latitude for independent judgment. May consult with senior peers and team leads to learn through experience. Typically requires two or more years of experience in a call center or customer service-related job in a service industry. One or more years financial services experience is preferable.
column11: International BPO, US Process, International Call Center, International Voice, International Process, International Voice Process, International Calling, UK Process

column2: Give a brief summary, in paragraph format, of how the role fits into the department and Equiniti. Describe the purpose of the job.              Core Duties and Responsibilities:              The successful candidate will be responsible for the following:            Answer inbound calls, emails from Shareholders and assist them with their queries within the agreed service standards.      Respond to basic queries referring to senior colleagues where appropriate.      Contribute to the completion of the team s workload.      Improve own skills as knowledge within the operational team taking opportunities to identify area for improvement to processes and service.      Undertake duties at a similar level as required.      Ensure compliance with Equiniti s procedures, standards and reporting requirements, together with all relevant regulatory and statutory requirements, where appropriate implementing actions to protect our business always.      Always to undertake the duties of this role in accordance with the requirements of the company s Regulators.      Complete work within the security arrangements of Equiniti. Any deliberate contravention of these procedures may lead to disciplinary procedure.      Ensure that all work is undertaken within the quality system.      Ensure that work and ethics comply with all security arrangements both physical and information.                Skills Attributes and Behaviour:                  The successful candidate will demonstrate the following experience, skills and behaviours:            Timely completion of own work / contribution to team workload      Meeting targets for accuracy, quality and agreed service levels      Satisfactory resolution of queries      Adherence to procedures and regulations      Contribution to continuous improvement      Ongoing development of own knowledge and skills      Demonstrate willingness to contribute to team beyond own immediate tasks      Quality of support given to colleagues      Development of technical knowledge and skill      Contribution to target achievement and team goals      Successful delivery of task              Benefits:        Being a permanent member of the team at EQ you will be rewarded by our company benefits, these are just a few of what is on offer:        31 days + 9 bank holidays (UK)      Business related certification expense reimbursement      Comprehensive Medical Assurance coverage for dependents & Parents      Two-way cab transport for staff working in UK & US shift      Accidental & Life cover 3 times of concerned CTC

column1: Customer Care Executive (Voice process) (3rd Party Payrolls )
column2: Designation :- Customer Care Executive (Voice process) Location :- Andheri (East) Job Description :- He/she will have to perform the following key activities:  Complete activity reports to measure individual/department effectiveness.  Coordinate and manage DM programs and ensure appropriate follow up. Where appropriate, to successfully open accounts for new DM customers. Ensure co-operation with other members of the sales team and throughout the sales force. Provide customer oriented service at all times relating to specific sales issues. Act as main contact for DHL of small trading accounts under Telesales, responding to them along with assigning their queries to correct account manager.  Manage multi-channel customers by phone or direct mail. Provide customer oriented service at all times for multi-channel customers. Build and maintain strong vendor-client relationships. Coordinate with all sales channels, CS and Marketing Department for lead management. Liaise with other departments to ensure delivery of service commitment to multi-channel customers. Ensure feedback is provided to all lead generators on status of all leads endorsed. Qualify all internal and external lead sources in order to pass leads to the appropriate sales resource. Skills Required   Good communication skills (verbal & written) Minimum education as Graduate Command on Tamil language will be an additional benefit (But not compulsory) Kindly Note:- This is a third party contract Role.

Customer Support associate / Banking Process associate
(Dubai, Onsite)
column2: Customer Support associate / Banking Process associate (Dubai, Onsite Opportunity) Job Description: As a Banking Process Associate, you will play a crucial role in ensuring compliance with regulatory requirements and mitigating risks associated with customer onboarding processes within the banking sector. To enhance KYC procedures and maintain high standards of due diligence. Roles & Responsibilities:- Communicate with banks customer to validate documents. Conduct thorough customer due diligence to verify the identity, legitimacy, and risk level of prospective and existing clients in accordance with local and international regulations. Analyze and assess the adequacy and accuracy of customer documentation, ensuring compliance with internal policies and regulatory guidelines. Work closely with internal stakeholders, including compliance officers, relationship managers, and legal teams, to address KYC-related issues. Handle queries for clients, providing appropriate assistance. Exhibit excellent communication and problem-solving skills. Respond to customer queries promptly and accurately. Follow up with customers for additional information. Provide accurate, valid, and complete information using the right tools. Qualifications:- Any Graduate or Postgraduates. Only Customer Service Experience. Fluency in English communication (Verbal and written) is a must. International blended Background preferred. Immediate joiners only. 2+ Years of proven experience in any domain. Experience within the banking or financial services sector, preferably will be an add on. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams and communicate complex concepts clearly and concisely. Attention to detail and a commitment to maintaining high standards of accuracy and compliance. Proficiency in relevant software applications and databases used for KYC processes. Join our team in Dubai and be part of a dynamic and collaborative environment while driving sustainable growth and success. Benefits: Competitive salary package. Visa sponsorship and travel arrangements provided by our client. Comprehensive training and development programs to enhance skills and career growth opportunities.

column2: Key Responsibilities : - The coustmer care Executive plays a vital role in promoting products or services, generating leads, and maintaining customer relationships over the phone. This role requires effective communication skills, a persuasive demeanor, and the ability to handle customer inquiries and concerns professionally. Tele calling Executives typically work in call centers, sales teams, or customer service departments. Responsibilities : Outbound Calls : Make outbound calls to potential customers or leads to introduce products/services, explain features and benefits, and generate interest. Inbound Calls : Answer incoming calls from customers, address inquiries, provide information, and resolve any issues they may have. Lead Generation : Identify and qualify potential leads through cold calling, market research, and data mining. Sales Pitch : Present and explain the value proposition of products/services to potential customers, highlighting how they meet the customers' needs. Customer Engagement : Build rapport with customers, understand their needs, and suggest appropriate solutions to address those needs. Product Knowledge : Possess a deep understanding of the products/services offered to answer customer questions accurately and persuasively. Follow-Up : Maintain a follow-up schedule to nurture leads and convert them into customers. Data Entry : Record and update customer information, interactions, and outcomes accurately in the company's CRM system. Targets and Metrics : Meet or exceed assigned sales targets, call quotas, and other performance metrics. Script Adherence : Follow provided call scripts while also adapting conversations based on customer responses. Objection Handling : Address customer objections and concerns effectively, striving to overcome resistance and hesitations. Upselling and Cross-Selling : Identify opportunities to upsell or cross-sell additional products/services to existing customers. Feedback : Provide feedback to the management team on common customer questions, concerns, and suggestions for improvement. Professionalism : Maintain a professional and courteous tone during interactions to ensure positive customer experiences. Time Management : Efficiently manage call time to maximize productivity and meet daily/weekly targets - Good Communication Skills (Spoken and Written) Languages : Kannada , English is Mandatory

column2: Skill required:  Voice - Service Desk Voice Support Designation:  Customer Contact Comms Associate Qualifications: Any Graduation  Years of Experience: 1 to 3 years  About Accenture Accenture is a global professional services company with leading capabilities in digital, cloud and security.Combining unmatched experience and specialized skills across more than 40 industries, we offer Strategy and Consulting, Technology and Operations services, and Accenture Song all powered by the worlds largest network of Advanced Technology and Intelligent Operations centers. Our 699,000 people deliver on the promise of technology and human ingenuity every day, serving clients in more than 120 countries. We embrace the power of change to create value and shared success for our clients, people, shareholders, partners and communities.Visit us at www.accenture.com  What would you do? You will be aligned with our Customer Support vertical and help us in managing/ resolving customers query, handling escalations and complaints of the dissatisfied customers & giving best resolutions. You will also be responsible for closing the fault and complaints within SLA's. Looking for a candidate who is good in communication and has good knowledge on metrics of Customer Support The role is aligned to our Service Desk Voice Support team which is responsible for performing day to day operations while maintaining SLAs & solving queries related to disputes while coordinating with customers. The team reviews service requests based on the predefined scope of support, records, diagnoses, and troubleshoots customer raised incidents. They also manage unplanned interruptions to restore normal service operations as quickly as possible for voice interactions. What are we looking for? Looking for Incident Managers  Roles and Responsibilities: In this role you are required to solve routine problems, largely through precedent and referral to general guidelines  Your expected interactions are within your own team and direct supervisor  You will be provided detailed to moderate level of instruction on daily work tasks and detailed instruction on new assignments  The decisions that you make would impact your own work  You will be an individual contributor as a part of a team, with a predetermined, focused scope of work  Please note that this role may require you to work in rotational shifts

column2: Job Description We are seeking a dedicated and customer-focused individual to join our team as a Customer Service Voice Support agent at Mr. Cooper. As a Voice Support agent, you will be the first point of contact for our customers, providing exceptional customer service and assisting with inquiries related to mortgage products, services, and account management. This role requires strong communication skills, a keen attention to detail, and a commitment to delivering a exemplary and efficient service. To carry out process transactions (data) based on client guidelines, to help achieve in part or whole resolution as required by the end customer within SLAs specified by the organization. Job could involve delivering tasks either through voice or non-voice medium. Key competencies required would be Business acumen, Customer First, Time management, Prioritization skills and some amount of decision making, specific to the process or transaction. Key Responsibilities: Engage with customers through chat or voice channels to address inquiries, concerns, and requests related to mortgage products, services, and account information. Provide accurate and comprehensive information about mortgage options, interest rates, loan terms, and other relevant details to assist customers in making informed decisions. Assist customers in navigating our online platforms and self-service tools, guiding them through account setup, payments, document submission, and other online activities. Collaborate with internal teams, such as loan officers, underwriters, and account managers, to resolve complex customer issues and escalate cases as necessary. Ensure all interactions are handled professionally, efficiently, and in compliance with company policies and industry regulations. Maintain detailed and accurate records of customer interactions, transactions, and inquiries using the company's CRM system. Identify opportunities to upsell or cross-sell additional mortgage products and services based on customer needs and preferences. Stay up to date with industry trends, product updates, and company policies to provide accurate and current information to customers. Participate in ongoing training sessions to enhance product knowledge, communication skills, and customer service techniques. Contribute to a positive team environment, sharing insights and best practices with fellow team members to improve overall customer satisfaction. Qualifications: 1. Bachelor's degree in any stream 2. Prior customer service experience, preferably in a chat would be great but not a prerequisite 3. Strong verbal and written communication skills with the ability to comprehend complex situations and respond accordingly 4. Familiarity with mortgage products, loan terminology, and the home buying process is a plus. 5. Proficiency in using customer relationship management (CRM) software and chat platforms. 6. Excellent problem-solving skills and the ability to handle challenging customer situations with patience and empathy. 7. Detail-oriented with a high degree of accuracy in data entry and documentation. 8. Ability to multitask, prioritize, and manage time effectively in a fast-paced environment. 9. Flexibility to work various shifts, including evenings, weekends, and holidays as needed. 10. Good Keyboard Typing skills min 30-40 WPM

In this role, you will be responsible for providing timely and effective assistance to customers from various countries, ensuring their satisfaction and building long-term relationships. Key Responsibilities: Responding to customer inquiries and providing support via phone, email, and chat in a professional and courteous manner. column2: Cleartrip Private Limited is looking for Executive - Customer Care to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey     As an Executive in the Customer Care department, you will be responsible for addressing customer inquiries, resolving complaints, and ensuring overall customer satisfaction     You will serve as a primary point of contact for customers, providing information about products or services, handling concerns, and facilitating solutions to problems     Your role will involve effective communication with customers via various channels, including phone, email, chat, and in-person interactions     Additionally, you will collaborate with other departments to ensure timely resolution of customer issues and contribute to maintaining positive customer relationships       Key Responsibilities:       Respond promptly to customer inquiries via phone, email, chat, or in-person interactions     Provide accurate information about products or services to customers     Resolve customer complaints efficiently and professionally, aiming to achieve complete customer satisfaction     Escalate complex issues to the appropriate department or management for resolution     Maintain detailed records of customer interactions and transactions     Follow up on customer interactions to ensure their concerns have been addressed and resolved satisfactorily     Collaborate with other departments, such as Sales or Technical Support, to resolve customer issues effectively     Stay updated on product knowledge and company policies to provide accurate information to customers     Identify and report trends in customer inquiries or complaints to management for improvement     Uphold company values and customer service standards in all interactions with customers

About the Role: Customer Service International Voice Process involves: Providing exceptional customer support and resolving queries over calls. Building credibility and trust with customers through empathetic communication. Researching, diagnosing, troubleshooting, and identifying solutions for customer issues. Flexibility to work in 24x7 environments, including US Shifts. Key Qualifications & Skills Required: Excellent command over English, including fluency in spoken English and strong customer service skills. High energy levels and excellent judgment skills to provide effective solutions. Quick learner and self-motivated individual. column2: Job description     Graduate with International Chat/customer service (US) experience Candidates are required to have excellent communication skills - written and oral. Ability to comprehend US customer needs through their written chat communication, translate the need into process query and provide the right resolution in a clear and concise manner Ability to understand the conversation between the chat bot and customer and pick up from there and continue Customer conversation. Analytical skills to understand the reason why the chat bot was unable to resolve customer query and provide intelligence back into the system on what needs to be changed within the Chat-bot Willingness to work mainly US shifts in a 24/7 environment with shift rotations Prior Chat Experience. Preferably has worked on dual concurrency. As a key member of our team, you will be responsible for ensuring seamless communication and support for our patients and their families navigating the complexities of healthcare.  . Responsibilities: Provide compassionate and efficient customer service to patients, caregivers, and healthcare professionals. Utilize specialized knowledge of health insurance verification, authorization, and referral procedures as they pertain to cancer treatment, to assist patients with navigating the healthcare system. Demonstrate a deep understanding  or willingness to learn  cancer-related terminology and treatment modalities to effectively communicate with patients and address their specific concerns and needs. Collaborate closely with oncologists, nurses, and other healthcare providers to ensure timely and accurate documentation of patient interactions and inquiries, with a focus on personalized cancer care. column2: A customer support agent in this role responds to customer queries over the phone, email and chat and provide support and resolution to existing/new queries on services provided by the client. The agent will play an integral role in improving the customer experience by providing fast, friendly, and effective service with accurate and personal solutions to customer inquiries coming from across the country - India. Minimum eligibility 1) Education: Graduate or above 2) Experience: 0-3 years in customer service Roles and responsibilities 1) Manage large amounts of incoming phone calls, email exchanges and chats from the customers across the country 2) Initiate outbound phone calls and emails to respond to customers need 3) Address customer complaints, research customer issues, provide appropriate solutions and alternatives within the time limits; follow up to ensure resolution 4) Escalate customer service issues, if required 5) Update and process information accurately into the case management system(s) and spreadsheets 6) Clear Communication - during all conversations with customers over the phone, email or chat, use English that delivers information and solutions in an easy manner 7) Follow communication procedures, guidelines, and policies 8) Professional Focus - demonstrates a high level of personal and professional integrity when dealing with Customers. Treats all customers with empathy, respect and consideration 9) Teamwork consistently work together, trust in each other, engage in constructive conversations for the good of the group 10) Perform non-phone, email or chat tasks whenever required in support of support of customer service such as reconciling duplicate records, work related to escalation desk, working on customer complaints and unresolved issues. Qualifications 1) Excellent in written and verbal English communication 2) Strong phone contact handling skills, email writing skills and chat handling skills and active listening 3) Good problem-solving skills 4) Professional, empathetic & courteous in speaking and writing NO BE,BTECH,MA,MCOM HR Recruiter- Kiran - 9611652646 Excellent Communication Mandatory Role & responsibilities   Preferred candidate profile   Perks and benefits

column2: MODI BUILDERS & INFRASTRUCTURES PVT LTD. is looking for Sr Manager Customer care to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey      As the Senior Manager of Customer Care, you will be responsible for leading and overseeing all aspects of customer service and support operations      Your role is crucial in ensuring high levels of customer satisfaction, retention, and loyalty through effective management of customer interactions and resolution of inquiries and issues      This position requires strong leadership, strategic thinking, and a customer-centric mindset to drive continuous improvement and deliver exceptional service experiences        Key Responsibilities:        Team Leadership and Management:Lead, coach, and mentor a team of customer service representatives, supervisors, and support staff      Set clear performance expectations, goals, and KPIs for the team and provide ongoing feedback and performance evaluations      Foster a positive and collaborative work environment that promotes employee engagement, development, and career growth      Customer Service Operations:Develop and implement customer service strategies, policies, and procedures to ensure consistent and high-quality service delivery      Oversee day-to-day operations of the customer care department, including call center management, email support, live chat, and social media interactions      Monitor service levels, response times, and customer satisfaction metrics to identify areas for improvement and drive operational excellence      Customer Experience Enhancement:Analyze customer feedback, surveys, and complaints to identify recurring issues and root causes      Work cross-functionally with product development, marketing, and sales teams to address customer pain points and improve the overall customer experience      Implement initiatives to enhance self-service options, reduce customer effort, and increase first-contact resolution rates      Performance Monitoring and Reporting:Track and analyze key performance indicators (KPIs) such as average handling time, customer satisfaction scores, and service level agreements (SLAs)      Prepare regular reports and dashboards to communicate performance metrics, trends, and insights to senior management      Utilize data-driven insights to make informed decisions and drive continuous improvement in customer care operations      Vendor Management and Resource Allocation:Manage relationships with third-party service providers, outsourced contact centers, and technology vendors to ensure service level agreements are met      Allocate resources effectively to meet demand fluctuations and seasonal peaks in customer service volume      Negotiate contracts, service agreements, and pricing terms with vendors to optimize costs and service quality

column2: Customer Service Advisor-UK Process JOB DESCRIPTION   Customer Service Advisor- ROLE Fabel Services Private Limited is searching for an experienced Customer Service Advisor, who can solve customers queries via email and phone. We need an ambitious individual who is passionate about making a difference and wants to be part of a growing organization and help in building a competitive edge to the business. SKILLS & EXPERIENCE ??Relevant experience in a customer service/admin role. ??Knowledge of basic optics preferred Computer literate. ??Experience in marketing/sales preferred but not required. ??Excellent communication skills both written and verbal. ??Great attitude towards problem solving. ??Good attention to detail ??Excellent telephone manner . CHARACTERISTICS AND RESPONSIBILITIES ??Handling customer queries via phone and email and dealing with them in an effective manner. ??Providing advice to patients on contact lens type, lens type, frames, and styling ??Processing sales over the phone and opting in services for automatic reorders. ??Dealing with customer returns - filing for refunds or exchanges ??Providing customer invoices ??Liaising with other departments to provide the best customer service. ??Liaising with other departments to provide the best customer service. ??Pro-actively providing outstanding customer service. EDUCATION ??Any Graduate   BENEFITS ??Competitive salary with health insurance ??Career development and personalization, a career that evolves to match your goals. ??Diversity of role, projects, and challenges ??Innovation factory  bright ideas welcomed, encouraged, and rewarded. COMPANY PROFILE Fabel Services: Empowering Ecommerce Excellence Fabel Services is a premier provider of comprehensive solutions for the thriving world of ecommerce and has been a trusted partner to one of the UK's leading Contact Lens and Glasses companies, for last 10 years. Fabel Services offers a wide range of solutions, including software and IT infra for the ecommerce business, maintenance, customer service, Finance & Accounts, logistics, and more. With an agile approach, we continue to upgrade our technology and services to meet the ever-evolving ecommerce industry needs and ensure that we keep customer satisfaction at the core of our business. With our growing business and expanding opportunities, we are looking for talented professionals that have a keen understanding of the ecommerce market to join us at Fabel Services and become part of a dynamic and forward-thinking team. We foster a collaborative work environment that encourages creativity, innovation, and continuous learning. For the high performers, there will be ample growth opportunities. If you are passionate about ecommerce and have the skillsets matching one of the published job profiles, please reach out to us at hr@fabelservices.net and learn more about the positions that we are hiring for. Make   this   Move   the   Turning   Point   of   Your   Career! Respond   with   your   CV   and   Resume   hiring@fabelservices.net,   recruitment@fabelservices.net

column2: Job Title:    Customer Support Executive  Company:  iEnergizer  Location:  Noida, India  Salary:  25k INR CTC  Employment Type:  Full-Time, Permanent   Education:  Graduation compulsory Contact Person- Aishwarya Pandey  Contact no- 9958163579 Address-  iEnergizer, Noida Sector 60, Nearest Metro station-59.  (Carry your CV and Aadhar Card for entry purpose)    Job Description:  iEnergizer is seeking enthusiastic and dedicated individuals to join our dynamic team as Inbound Customer Support Executives. As a Customer Support Executive, you will be responsible for providing exceptional service to our customers via inbound calls, addressing their queries, resolving issues, and ensuring overall customer satisfaction.   Responsibilities: Handle inbound calls from customers with professionalism and empathy. Listen attentively to customer needs and provide appropriate solutions. Respond to customer inquiries regarding products, services, and general company information. Resolve customer complaints and escalate complex issues to the appropriate department if needed. Maintain a high level of customer satisfaction through effective communication and problem-solving skills. Keep accurate records of customer interactions and transactions. Requirements: Graduates  Excellent communication skills in English (both verbal and written). Ability to multitask, prioritize, and manage time effectively. Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail. Previous experience in customer service or call center environment is preferred but not required. Willingness to work in a fast-paced environment and flexible to work in rotational shifts if required. Benefits: Competitive salary package with attractive incentives. Comprehensive training program to enhance your skills and knowledge. Opportunity for career growth and advancement within the company. Friendly work environment with supportive team members. 5 days working schedule to maintain a healthy work-life balance. If you are passionate about providing exceptional customer service and ready to embark on a rewarding career journey, we would love to hear from you! Apply now to join our team at iEnergizer and make a difference in the lives of our customers.   Contact Person- Aishwarya Pandey Contact no - 9958163579 Address- iEnergizer, Noida Sector 60, Nearest Metro station-59

column2: Dear Candidate,  Greetings for the day!!!  Stepstone Careers Recruitment  is a leading Career guidance firm, recruiting manpower for the top MNC's . Currently we have urgent requirements for Senior/Fresher Voice/Semi Voice/Technical Support & Customer Support Process in BPO domain for leading MNC's. Please find the Job description below. If you are interested feel free to call SONU @ 9035233889     Responsibilities  Developing engaging social media strategies.  Managing social media platforms of the organization.  Scheduling social media posts.  Engaging followers with regular company updates.  Overseeing Social Media teamwork.  Responding to the comments on social media on time.  Monitoring social media metrics and ROI.  Analyzing social media trends.  Preparing social media engagement and activities reports.  Optimizing social media content effectively.  Staying up to date with the latest social media advertising efforts and goals.     Requirements  10+2, Grad  Demonstrate the ability to understand the engagement metrics and KPIs.  Excellent knowledge of research requirements for social media strategy.  Sound knowledge of social media scheduling platforms such as sprinklr, Radian6, Hootsuite, Gorgeous etc.  Outstanding proofreading and editing skills.  Strong oral and written communication skills.  Ability to write catchy content.  In-depth understanding of various social media platforms and their algorithm changes.  Strong organizational and time management skills.     Process: Social Media Qualification: 10+2, Grad or Post Graduate Shifts: Rotational Salary: up to 5.6LPA (42Takehome) (only if you have relevant experience) Experience: 0 to 2years Versant Score: Above 60 Location: Marathahalli   For any quires call or WhatsApp to 9035233889 or mail at sonu.dignifiedcareers@gmail.com Note: - Looking for candidates who can join us immediately and should be staying in Bangalore. for Venue, please share your CV on Whatsapp   If this Job description doesn't suit your profile, kindly ignore & pass it to your friends those who are looking for job or job change in BPO industry.

column2: Enterprise products:      -Deep knowledge on Core (CMU , APC, CMM , CMG )    -good Knowledge on EVC, NGC, Radio / IXR SR/router    -Hands on Experience core nodes like CMU 4G = CMM(MME) +CMG(SGW +PWG )+ APC(HSS+ PCRF),CMU 5G = AMF+UPF+SMF+ APC (AUSF+ UDM/UDR) and/or EVC - Enterprise Voice Core for CSCF, TAS, SBC, MRF    -Flexible to work on-call (24*7 for a week)    -Deep Traces/Logs checks / Wireshark traces analysis skills        Nice to have:      -Deep knowledge in 4G/5G Technologies    -Knowledge on VOLTE,VOWIFI call flow and exposure in evolving technologies like Cloud, SDN , Iot and 5GC    -Knowledge on IPN like interface, protocols, routing, routers ,switches etc.    -Core knowledge with L2/L3 level skills of Packet core / Circuit core and E2E Overall customer network management.    -Radio , IP Core router/ Service router Working skills          Generic:      Represents the Technical Support Service in front of customer, managing difficult situations and conflict resolutions. (Note : CTCA is a dedicated role, EG only for customer(s) that is assigned to)      Represents customer (interests) within Nokia for Technical Support Service activities.      Provides customer-facing communication regarding operational, technical and quality issues. Makes timely recommendations to customer.      Provides analysis of product release notes and alerts to the customer.      Provides technical guidance for upgrades / retrofits, if within the scope of SWS.      Supports Emergency Management (EM) team in technical aspects of outage management.      Maintains information about customer network in relevant databases.      Supports Care Program Management (CaPM) from a technical stand point.      Is responsible along with / Coordinates with Care Program Management (CaPM) for customer satisfaction.      Keeps aware of network health from SWS perspective.      Keeps technically abreast with NPI and rollout activities of the customer.      Keeps aware of tendering negotiations (SWS scope) for the customer. Can make suggestions or raise concerns.      Shares sales opportunities with Care Program Management (CaPM) or Sales.      Interprets internal and external business challenges and recommends best practices contributing to improve products, processes and services. .      Solves complex problems based on sophisticated analytical thought and complex judgment.      Acts as a technical leader for taskforces, often the most senior specialist in a team, who serves as best practice resource within own organisational unit and / or is recognised as an expert within the same professional area in the business.      Support key customer projects.      Interprets critical internal or external business issues and develops innovative solutions that help to sustain competitive advantage.      Acts as a senior subject matter expert, typically at a global or regional level, in many organisational units the most senior internal expert who serves as best practice / quality resource and is an acknowledged authority both within and outside own organisational unit.

column2: Cauvery Tata is looking for Customer Care Officer to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey      As a Customer Care Professional, your primary responsibility is to ensure exceptional customer service and satisfaction      You will be the frontline representative of the company, interacting with customers via various communication channels to address inquiries, resolve issues, and provide support        Key Responsibilities        Customer Support: Respond promptly to customer inquiries via phone, email, chat, or social media channels      Listen attentively to customer concerns, provide accurate information, and offer appropriate solutions to meet their needs      Issue Resolution: Investigate and resolve customer complaints or issues in a timely manner, ensuring a satisfactory resolution for the customer while adhering to company policies and procedures      Product Knowledge: Develop a deep understanding of the company's products or services to effectively assist customers with questions, troubleshooting, and product recommendations      Communication: Communicate effectively and professionally with customers, colleagues, and other departments to relay important information, escalate issues when necessary, and collaborate on problem-solving      Documentation: Maintain detailed and accurate records of customer interactions, including inquiries, complaints, and resolutions, using the company's CRM system or other designated platforms      Customer Satisfaction: Strive to exceed customer expectations by delivering personalized service, demonstrating empathy, and going above and beyond to ensure customer satisfaction and loyalty      Continuous Improvement: Identify opportunities for process improvements or and compliance with regulatory requirements

column1: Openings For Freshers International Voice Process in Chennai
column2: Dear Candidate, Greeting from  NTT DATA,  We are happy to take your profile for a wonderful career with  NTT DATA. Job Title:   AR Caller (US Voice Process) Experience:   Freshers Shift:   US Shift (Night Shift) Mode of Work:   Work From Office Work Location:   Chennai - DLF Required Skillset:  Fluency in English communication & Stability In these roles you will be responsible for: - Performing outbound calls to insurance companies (in the US) to collect outstanding Accounts Receivables. - Responding to customer requests by phone and/or in writing to ensure customer satisfaction and to assure that service standards are met - Analyzing medical insurance claims for quality assurance - Resolving moderately routine questions following pre-established guidelines - Performing routine research on customer inquiries. - Developing and maintaining a solid working knowledge of the healthcare insurance industry and of all products, services and processes performed by the team - Identify the outstanding claims with payers through the reports from clients - Place calls with payers with regard to outstanding claims - Document the details of the calls made to payers in DBPMS and the client software - Coordinate with the team leader in following the processes Requirements for this role include: - Ability to work regularly scheduled shifts from Monday-Friday 08:00pm to 06:00am IST. - University degree or equivalent that required 3+ years of formal studies of the English language. Regards, Dharani Priya S | Talent Acquisition

column2: Job Title: Inbound Patient Calling Executive Opportunity : Remote, Pan India Shift: Night Shift About Us: NPB is a provider of critical services for US based medical practices. We are dedicated to delivering exceptional customer service and support to healthcare professionals and their patients. We are currently seeking passionate individuals to join our team and contribute to the enhancement of patient experiences. Position Overview: As an Inbound Patient Calling Executive, you will serve as a vital link between patients, healthcare professionals, and our clients. Your role will be to provide outstanding customer service, clear English-speaking abilities, and proficiency in call center functions to ensure seamless communication and support for all callers. Responsibilities: Receive incoming calls from patients, healthcare professionals, and other callers. Address inquiries, provide information, and assist callers with their concerns. Schedule and manage patient appointments, ensuring accuracy and efficiency. Coordinate with healthcare providers and clinics to book appointments. Collect and verify patient information, including personal details, insurance information, and medical history. Update and maintain patient records accurately. Offer information on healthcare services, medical procedures, and general inquiries. Guide patients on pre-appointment instructions and any necessary preparations. Address patient queries, concerns, and complaints in a professional and empathetic manner. Escalate issues to the appropriate department or supervisor as needed. Verify insurance coverage and process insurance-related inquiries. Assist patients in understanding their insurance benefits and coverage. Adhere to strict confidentiality and privacy guidelines when handling patient information. Collaborate with healthcare professionals, nurses, and administrative staff to ensure smooth patient communication and service delivery. Qualifications: Education: College diploma or equivalent. Advanced healthcare-related education or certifications is a great advantage. Communication Skills: Excellent verbal and written communication skills. Ability to communicate clearly and empathetically with patients. Customer Service Skills: Strong customer service orientation with the ability to remain calm and professional in challenging situations. Computer Skills: Proficient in using computer systems, electronic health records (EHR), and scheduling software. Organizational Skills: Ability to manage multiple tasks, prioritize work, and maintain attention to detail. Medical Terminology: Basic knowledge of medical terminology is often beneficial. Empathy and Compassion: Ability to empathize with patients and provide compassionate assistance. Team Player: Capable of working collaboratively with a multidisciplinary healthcare team. Incentive Plan: At NPB, we believe in recognizing and rewarding outstanding performance. In addition to a monthly base salary of 25,000 INR to 30,000INR  for new trainees and 40,000 INR to -50,000 INR for those experienced with healthcare related call centers.  Additionally, we offer the following incentive plan recommendations: Performance Bonuses: Employees who consistently demonstrate exceptional customer service and meet or exceed performance metrics may be eligible for performance bonuses. Attendance and Punctuality Rewards: We value your commitment and punctuality. Employees with excellent attendance and on-time performance may receive special incentives. Training and Certification Bonuses: If additional healthcare-related certifications are required for the role, we provide support for obtaining them and offer bonuses upon successful completion. Referral Program: Recommend qualified candidates to join our team, and if they are hired and complete a probationary period successfully, you may be eligible for referral bonuses.   Role & responsibilities   Preferred candidate profile   Perks and benefits

column2: Ambal Auto is looking for Customer Care Manager & Floor Manager to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey      job description for a role that focuses on managing and overseeing customer relationships and ensuring their satisfaction      The primary responsibility of a Customer Manager is to build strong relationships with customers, understand their needs, and ensure a positive experience throughout their journey with the company      Here are some common responsibilities and requirements associated with this role:        Responsibilities:        Customer Relationship Management: Developing and maintaining relationships with customers to understand their needs, preferences, and challenges      Acting as the main point of contact for any inquiries, concerns, or requests      Customer Satisfaction: Ensuring customer satisfaction by addressing their issues, resolving complaints, and providing timely and effective solutions      Proactively identifying opportunities for improvement and implementing measures to enhance the customer experience      Account Management: Managing and growing a portfolio of customers, which may include key accounts or high-value customers      Developing account plans, monitoring customer performance, and identifying opportunities for upselling or cross-selling      Customer Success: Collaborating with customers to define their goals and objectives      Providing guidance, support, and training to help customers achieve their desired outcomes and maximize the value they receive from the company's products or services      Communication and Coordination: Maintaining regular communication with customers through meetings, calls, emails, and other channels      Coordinating internally with different teams (such as sales, marketing, and support) to address customer needs and ensure a seamless experience      Customer Feedback: Collecting and analyzing customer feedback, surveys, and reviews      Identifying trends, insights, and areas for improvement      Sharing feedback internally and driving initiatives to enhance customer satisfaction and loyalty      Customer Retention: Implementing strategies and initiatives to retain existing customers      Developing retention programs, loyalty initiatives, and customer engagement activities to build long-term relationships      Requirements:Customer-Focused Mindset: A strong passion for customer satisfaction and a customer-centric approach to problem-solving      Empathy and the ability to understand and anticipate customer needs      Communication Skills: Excellent verbal and written communication skills to effectively interact with customers      Active listening skills to understand customer requirements, concerns, and feedback      Relationship Building: Strong interpersonal skills to build and maintain trust-based relationships with customers      Ability to collaborate and connect with individuals at various levels within customer organizations      Problem-Solving Abilities: Strong analytical and problem-solving skills to identify customer pain points, propose solutions, and address challenges effectively      Industry Knowledge: Familiarity with the industry or market in which the company operates      Understanding of customer needs, market trends, and competitive landscape      Organizational Skills: Strong organization and time management skills to handle multiple customers and tasks simultaneously      Attention to detail in maintaining accurate customer records and documentation      Team Collaboration: Ability to work collaboratively with cross-functional teams, such as sales, marketing, product development, and support, to ensure a unified customer experience

column2: Greetings From 24-7 Intouch!! About 24-7 Intouch: 24-7 Intouch is a global customer care and technology company. With over 20 years of experience, 18,000+ team members, and campuses around the globe, were obsessed with providing remarkable customer experiences for the world's most innovative brands. We are hiring for International Technical Chat Process & Voice Process 15 Days or less (or)Immediate Joiners are preferred ( Customer support) About the Job: We are looking for a self-motivated individual with excellent customer service skills to join our team!. Our Customer Support Associates will provide Multi-level assistance by diagnosing and solving the issues with the goal of providing the best solution to our customers. As a Customer Service Associate, You Will Troubleshoot customers issues via Chat, remote access, and diagnostics. Collaborate with customers and advise about technical issues. Answer questions regarding issues, and make recommendations. Troubleshoot network and connection issues. Manage customer expectations regarding estimated response times. Have daily interactions with customers and handle all issues from end to end via call. Go the extra mile to engage customers in solving issues and ensure satisfaction. Quickly and effectively build rapport with customers, diagnose and resolve issues Provide white glove service and have the ability to provide an overall excellent customer experience. As a Customer Service Associate , You Have A minimum of 6 Months of experience of Technical Support with international Clients A post-secondary degree in any major Institute Fluency in spoken English Excellent judgment skills to be able to properly evaluate situations and immediately provide effective solutions. The ability to learn new skills and quickly absorb and interpret new information, products, and features from the perspective of the customer Excellent communication skills and high emotional intelligence Excellent problem solving and customer service skills Strong analytical & Interpersonal skills The ability to be a self-starter, a sense of urgency, and the ability to remain calm under pressure A flexible schedule Must be okay to work nights Benefits of working as a Customer Service Associate: An attractive compensation package with performance-based incentives Incredible learning and growth opportunities Outstanding rewards and recognition program & employee engagement activities Transport while working on-site Medical Insurance PF and ESI / Health Insurance 2 way transportation both pick up & drop Incentive plans based on performance 5 working days with 2 week offs Preferred Skills/Abilities/Exposure: Graduate/Post Graduate/UG is Also Fine Should possess effective and excellent communication skills (Verbal & Written) Willing to work in Rotational Shifts, Night Shifts & Graveyard Shifts 100% Work from Office Work Location: Hyderabad Note - Candidates who already gave an interview in the last 60 Days are not Eligible. column2: About the Role  As a Student Success Associate, you will be the (Point-Of-Contact) POC  between the students and the internal team. If you are someone who is an active listener, can patiently resolve problems as they arise, then this role is for you. You'll work closely with a diverse group of people coming from leading MNCs such as McKinsey, BCG, KPMG,  Deloitte, EY, etc. to establish,  nurture, and grow business across categories & territories. This is an amazing opportunity to learn from an extraordinary team,  grow massively and help students around the globe build an  awesome career for themselves.     What will you do:   Act as the guide who takes the students through their journey.  Execute the duties of a POC by talking to the students, helping, supporting, and motivating them. Also, ensure to be their constant companion until they achieve their learning outcomes  Own the whole journey of the participants to ensure high satisfaction levels. Ensure complete ownership of all the responsibilities around scheduling and delivery activities, including but not limited to, counselling sessions, essays, any other documentation etc.  Engage with a variety of stakeholders like senior managers, academicians, industry professionals and many internal & external stakeholders Perform consistent and thorough monitoring of participants' performance and engagement using various program trackers to ensure each participant gets personalised experience in terms of support. This will require forging meaningful relationships with the participants Monitor managing, identifying and implementing processes to ensure a consistent experience.     What will you need:   Graduate/MBA, preferably in the field of business, economics or management   Minimum 1-2 years of experience in handling  teams in customer service/ business development/ sales  Knowledge of the overseas education space.   Creative bent of mind.   Ability to work well in a team and in a start-up environment.   Ability to adhere to strict deadlines and short TATs (turnaround times).   Problem solving - good aptitude and stakeholder  management skills   Quick learning - ability to learn business &  processes   Excellent oral and written communication skills   Ability to hold meaningful conversations with  senior professionals   What will you get: Be a part of the fast-growing startup defining strategies for the growth of the company. Partner in building a global Ed-tech company that is going to impact hundreds of thousands of lives. Phenomenal work environment, with massive ownership and excellent growth opportunities. A young, dynamic, and passionate team  Industry best perks

the sales and workshop processes      Sales Support:Collaborate with the sales team to understand customer requirements and preferences      Provide support during the sales process, assisting feedback and work with teams to address concerns or areas for improvement      Service Quality Assurance:Implement and uphold service quality standards in both sales and workshop processes column2: Equitas Small Finance Bank Ltd. is looking for Tele Calling Executive to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey      As a Telecalling Executive, your main responsibility will be to make outbound calls to potential customers, clients, or prospects with the aim of generating leads, making sales, or providing information about products or services      You will play a crucial role in promoting the company's offerings and maintaining strong customer relationships through effective communication over the phone      Here is a comprehensive job description for a Telecalling Executive:Outbound Calling: Make outbound calls to prospective customers using the provided leads, customer database, or other sources      Introduce the company's products or services and explain their features and benefits      Engage in persuasive conversations to generate leads or close sales      Lead Generation: Identify and qualify potential leads through telephonic conversations      Gather information about the customer's requirements, interests, and budget to determine their suitability as a prospect      Maintain accurate and detailed records of all interactions and outcomes      Customer Engagement: Build rapport and establish a positive relationship with customers through effective communication      Address customer queries, concerns, or objections professionally and provide suitable solutions or information      Strive to enhance customer satisfaction and ensure a positive customer experience      Product/Service Promotion: Have a comprehensive understanding of the company's products or services and effectively communicate their value propositions to customers      Highlight key features, benefits, and unique selling points to create interest and drive sales      Sales and Targets: Meet or exceed assigned sales targets and goals within the specified time frame      Utilize persuasive sales techniques to close deals and secure customer commitments      Upsell or cross-sell additional products or services where appropriate      Data Management: Maintain accurate and up-to-date customer information, including contact details, interactions, and preferences, in the company's CRM (Customer Relationship Management) system      Regularly update and track customer progress and follow-up actions      Market Research: Stay informed about industry trends, market conditions, and competitor activities      Gather customer feedback, suggestions, and insights during calls and provide inputs to improve products, services, or sales strategies      Team Collaboration: Collaborate with the sales team, marketing team, or other departments to align efforts, share insights, and contribute to overall business objectives      Coordinate with team members to ensure smooth information flow and timely follow-ups      Requirements:High school diploma or equivalent; additional education or relevant certification is a plus      Proven experience in telecalling, telemarketing, or sales, preferably in a related industry      Excellent verbal communication skills and a confident, persuasive telephone manner      Strong customer service orientation with the ability to build rapport and establish trust      Result-oriented mindset with a drive to achieve targets and meet deadlines      Good negotiation and objection handling skills to address customer concerns effectively      Ability to work independently and manage time efficiently in a fast-paced environment      Familiarity with CRM software and proficiency in using computers and office productivity tools      Fluency in multiple languages, if required for specific target markets or customer segments, can be an added advantage      Ethical conduct and adherence to privacy regulations when handling customer data

column2: Lead Generation and Sales:              Conduct outbound calls to prospective customers to generate leads and promote products or services.          Follow up on leads generated through marketing campaigns, website inquiries, and other channels to qualify prospects and convert them into sales opportunities.          Achieve individual and team sales targets by effectively communicating product features, benefits, and pricing to potential customers.              Customer Service and Support:              Handle inbound calls from existing customers, providing assistance, resolving inquiries, and addressing concerns in a professional and timely manner.          Build rapport and establish positive relationships with customers to enhance satisfaction and loyalty.          Escalate complex issues or unresolved customer complaints to appropriate channels for resolution.              Team Leadership and Supervision:              Lead and supervise a team of telecallers, providing guidance, coaching, and performance feedback to drive productivity and results.          Monitor and evaluate team performance, including call quality, conversion rates, and adherence to scripts and protocols.          Conduct regular training sessions and workshops to enhance the skills and knowledge of team members.              Call Center Operations:              Ensure the smooth operation of the call center, including managing call queues, scheduling shifts, and optimizing staffing levels to meet service level agreements (SLAs).          Monitor call volumes, handle overflow calls during peak periods, and implement strategies to minimize wait times and maximize efficiency.          Maintain accurate records of calls, sales transactions, and customer interactions using CRM software or call center management systems.          Reporting and Analysis:          Generate reports and analyze call center metrics, including call volume, response times, and conversion rates, to identify trends, areas for improvement, and opportunities for optimization.          Provide regular updates and insights to management on team performance, sales trends, and customer feedback.            Freshers or Experience in Tele calling.

column2: Job Description: Skill required:   International Voice  - Customer Service  Technology Support Designation:  Management Level - Analyst/Associate Job Location:  Bengaluru Qualifications:  Any Graduation Years of Experience:  1.5  to 5 years What would you do? You will be aligned with our Customer Support vertical and help us in managing/ resolving customers query, handling escalations and complaints of the dissatisfied customers & giving best resolutions. You will also be responsible for closing the fault and complaints within SLA's. The Query Management team is accountable for the Inbound/Outbound calls and e-mail/chat support to resolve customer issues. This role is aligned to our Customer Service Technology Support team which works on providing technical assistance on the use of specific systems, software and infrastructure and in troubleshooting of technical problems. What are we looking for? Adaptable and flexible Roles and Responsibilities In this role you are required to solve routine problems, largely through precedent and referral to general guidelines Your primary interaction is within your own team and your direct supervisor In this role you will be given detailed instructions on all tasks The decisions that you make impact your own work and are closely supervised You will be an individual contributor as a part of a team with a predetermined, narrow scope of work Please note that this role may require you to work in rotational shifts

Strong problem-solving skills and ability to multitask in a fast-paced environment. Empathetic and customer-focused attitude with a passion for delivering exceptional service. Ability to work effectively both independently and as part of a team. Flexibility to work in shifts, including weekends and holidays, as required. Benefits: Competitive salary package with additional performance-based incentives. Comprehensive training and development programs to enhance your skills and knowledge. Opportunities for career growth and advancement within the organization. Health insurance, retirement plans, and other benefits as per company policy.

column2: The Call Center Associate answers incoming calls from patients and referring doctors. The main responsibility is to get patients appointments scheduled efficiently and accurately. ESSENTIAL FUNCTIONS: To perform this job successfully, an individual must be able to perform each essential function satisfactorily with or without accommodation. The requirements listed below are representative, but not all inclusive, of the knowledge, skill, and/or ability required. Reasonable accommodations may be made to enable qualified individuals with disabilities to perform the essential job functions. 1) Serve as the first point of contact for new patients and referring doctors needing to schedule and reschedule appointments 2) Resolve caller needs including addressing complaints, providing direction, connecting patients with the clinics or doctors, etc. 3) Meet the established call center associate metrics for quality, schedule adherence, hold times, call completion, productivity, and caller satisfaction REQUIRED: High School education, GED or equivalent. Six months of Customer Service Experience. DESIRABLE: Spanish speaking preferred. Medical experience preferred. KNOWLEDGE/SKILLS/ABILITIES/TALENTS:  Ability to be courteous to fellow co-workers in person/over the phone  Ability to have patience and empathy on the phone while speaking to patients  Ability to respond to common inquiries from customers, staff, vendors, or other members of the community.  Ability to draw valid conclusions, apply sound judgment in making decisions, and to make decisions under pressure.  Ability to interpret and apply policies and procedures.  Must address others professionally and respectfully by actions, words, and deeds.  Detail oriented, organized, process focused, problem solver, self-motivated, proactive, customer service focused.  Ability to multitask effectively and work in a fast paced and sometimes ambiguous environment, without compromising quality of work.  Ability to prioritize tasks and projects with limited direction, while understanding and contributing to the success of the clinic.  Ability to identify and escalate issues appropriately and professionally. WORK ENVIRONMENT: The work environment characteristics described here are representative of those an employee encounter while performing the essential functions of this job.  This is primarily an office classification. Temperature conditions are controlled with limited direct exposure to hazardous physical substances. The noise level in the work environment is usually low to moderate. There is occasional exposure to irate staff, vendors, or patients.  While performing the duties of this job, the employee is regularly required to sit, stand, walk, handle, or feel, reach with hands and arms, see, talk, and hear. The employee will frequently lift and/or carry reports, records and other materials that typically weigh less than 20 pounds. The employee is occasionally required to stoop, kneel, bend, or crouch.  Finger dexterity is needed to access, enter, and retrieve data using a computer keyboard, calculator, and other standard office equipment. All of the information contained herein reflect general details as necessary to describe the principal functions of this classification, the level of knowledge and skill typically required and the scope of responsibility, but should not be considered an all-inclusive listing of work requirements. Management reserves the rights to add, modify, change, or rescind the duties and/or work assignments of all positions, without advanced notice, and to make reasonable accommodations so that qualified employees can perform the essential functions of the job. Notwithstanding any of the foregoing described job responsibilities, employee shall not engage in activities that constitute the practice of ophthalmology as prohibited under applicable law. Employee shall neither exercise control over nor interfere with the clinician-patient relationship. Clinicians shall have sole responsibility for all professional services provided to patients.
column11: Communication Skills, Spoken English, Accent, Clarity, Fluent
