column2: Job Title: Inbound Patient Calling Executive Opportunity : Hybrid, Pan India Shift: Night Shift About Us: NPB is a provider of critical services for US based medical practices. We are dedicated to delivering exceptional customer service and support to healthcare professionals and their patients. We are currently seeking passionate individuals to join our team and contribute to the enhancement of patient experiences. Position Overview: As an Inbound Patient Calling Executive, you will serve as a vital link between patients, healthcare professionals, and our clients. Your role will be to provide outstanding customer service, clear English-speaking abilities, and proficiency in call center functions to ensure seamless communication and support for all callers. Responsibilities: Receive incoming calls from patients, healthcare professionals, and other callers. Address inquiries, provide information, and assist callers with their concerns. Schedule and manage patient appointments, ensuring accuracy and efficiency. Coordinate with healthcare providers and clinics to book appointments. Collect and verify patient information, including personal details, insurance information, and medical history. Update and maintain patient records accurately. Offer information on healthcare services, medical procedures, and general inquiries. Guide patients on pre-appointment instructions and any necessary preparations. Address patient queries, concerns, and complaints in a professional and empathetic manner. Escalate issues to the appropriate department or supervisor as needed. Verify insurance coverage and process insurance-related inquiries. Assist patients in understanding their insurance benefits and coverage. Adhere to strict confidentiality and privacy guidelines when handling patient information. Collaborate with healthcare professionals, nurses, and administrative staff to ensure smooth patient communication and service delivery. Qualifications: Education: College diploma or equivalent. Advanced healthcare-related education or certifications is a great advantage. Communication Skills: Excellent verbal and written communication skills. Ability to communicate clearly and empathetically with patients. Customer Service Skills: Strong customer service orientation with the ability to remain calm and professional in challenging situations. Computer Skills: Proficient in using computer systems, electronic health records (EHR), and scheduling software. Organizational Skills: Ability to manage multiple tasks, prioritize work, and maintain attention to detail. Medical Terminology: Basic knowledge of medical terminology is often beneficial. Empathy and Compassion: Ability to empathize with patients and provide compassionate assistance. Team Player: Capable of working collaboratively with a multidisciplinary healthcare team. Incentive Plan: At NPB, we believe in recognizing and rewarding outstanding performance. In addition to a monthly base salary of 25,000 INR to 30,000INR for new trainees and 40,000 INR to -50,000 INR for those experienced with healthcare related call centers. Additionally, we offer the following incentive plan recommendations: Performance Bonuses: Employees who consistently demonstrate exceptional customer service and meet or exceed performance metrics may be eligible for performance bonuses. Attendance and Punctuality Rewards: We value your commitment and punctuality. Employees with excellent attendance and on-time performance may receive special incentives. Training and Certification Bonuses: If additional healthcare-related certifications are required for the role, we provide support for obtaining them and offer bonuses upon successful completion. Referral Program: Recommend qualified candidates to join our team, and if they are hired and complete a probationary period successfully, you may be eligible for referral bonuses.   Role & responsibilities   Preferred candidate profile   Perks and benefits

column1: Placement Specialist - TELE Caller - US OUT BOUND SALES
column2: Role & responsibilities     Sales - Placement Specialist - Cancun (Onsite) Do you want to work for a U.S. based company where Exceeding Your Sales Metrics = HUGE Commissions??$$$ We customize and personalize your career path development to maximize your professional potential. Who we are? We are a Global IT Consulting firm based in Atlanta, Georgia. In a world where code is poetry and bugs are our arch-nemeses, Tech Consulting emerges as the quirky squad of tech-savvy superheroes you never knew you needed. We're not just an IT consulting firm; we're the ultimate league of digital dynamos, specializing in nationwide staff augmentation. Picture us as your trusty sidekicks, armed with keyboards and caffeinated beverages, swooping in to rescue your projects from mediocrity. Wherever you are, we've got your back! We focus on building successful IT careers for our employees! We currently augment our clients with project support offerings across several Technologies- Android and iPhone Mobile Development, AWS, Big Data, Data Science, MS Exchange, Cyber Security, and Azure. We are a growing company with approximately 500 clients globally and have built careers for thousands of employees over the past two decades. Take the next step and talk to us!! Website: www.techconsulting.net We are looking for Sales Associates with at least 3-5 years of sales experience negotiating and closing deals. This position entails placing our technical consultants on various IT projects throughout the United States (IT bench Sales). You will be provided with comprehensive on-the-job training. Job Requirements:  3-5 years of experience in sales, preferred industries IT recruiting, consulting or collections  100% English (written/spoken)  Degree in Business, Computer science, Marketing, or related field Skills:  Sales oriented/driven  Negotiation skills a must  Fast paced, multi-tasking, prospecting, discovering  Possess high level of business acumen  Strong communication skills  Setting expectations, and tactfully discussing/negotiating best hourly rates  Storytelling, active listening, objection handling  Preferred, but not a must- previous international sales experience (U.S., Canada, or Europe) Day-to-Day Basics of the Role:  Negotiate with global vendors in order to procure the best hourly rates for our IT consultants  Ensure win-win situations by offering excellent engagement and customer service to our clients  Meet and/or exceed daily/weekly KPIs/Metrics  Continual follow-up with our clients and IT consultants pre & post project confirmation  Make at least 80-100 calls to various companies and vendors in the United States regarding their staffing needs and open technology positions  You will be assigned 2-4 profiles/month in one of our core technologies- the end goal being to place our IT consultants on projects with fortune 500 companies.  Ensure proper flow of communication between respective departments  Ensure that each account assigned to you is detailed, accurate, and continually up-to-date  Must arrive at work on time and will be expected to go above and beyond in order to accomplish deliverables Key Requirements:  Must have experience negotiating and closing sales  Must be able to commute to and work in an office setting (this is not a remote opportunity)  Must be an extremely proactive person who takes pride in their work  Must be reliable and commit to working a full-time work schedule  Must be an extrovert and have a charismatic personality  Ability to relate to all types of people and understand their core-needs  Must be computer literate and know how to use MS Office and corporate email  Must have excellent written and verbal communication skills  Must be multi-tasker who is very organized and pays great attention to detail We Offer:  Direct hire as a U.S. Contractor  Full-time employment / Permanent contract / Excellent Base Salary, plus Bonus  Commissions are not capped- Potential to Double or Tipple your Salary!!  Offered Gross salary  Continual training (you dont have to be an expert in IT)  No Mexican law benefits are offered Preferred candidate profile   Perks and benefits

column1: Team Lead - Customer Support/ Customer Service
column2: CS Team lead: - The Team Lead must have a passion for data, efficiency, accuracy, and coaching & developing others. - Review team capacity, identify risks and opportunities in daily operations, and work closely with stakeholders to reassess prioritization as needed as per the business goals and implement the initiatives - Works with internal/external teams and uses his/her knowledge and expertise to execute business goals - Manage a team of 15-20 CS consultants on a day-to-day basis monitoring job or queue adherence, volume, and quality (all operations) - Roster management - Develop the work schedule for the week by balancing capacity across various processes - Ensure productivity/utilization is maximized through supervision, training, analysis, and feedback of performance data on a periodic basis - Responsible for known SLAs and task completion targets (within provided capacity). File and track tickets, following up on blocks to productivity - Devices and implements performance improvement plans for consultants. Provides regular coaching and feedback to direct reports with regard to utilization, quality, performance, behavior and career development. - Holds team members accountable for performance based on metrics and adherence to rules and guidelines. - Implement process improvement projects that impact team level performance. Participates in new workflow roll out projects. - Requirements/preferable qualifications: a. 2 years of experience in a people management role b. Bachelor degree qualification or equivalent work experience c. Intermediate or advanced MS Excel skills d. Strong attention to detail and organizational skills e. Strong judgment and instincts and able to prioritize in complex, fast-paced environment f. Strong people management skills and ability to lead by example g. Ability to adapt to dynamic project requirements h. High level of energy and proactive nature. A sense of ownership and drive and a willingness to accept the challenge of daily deadlines is essential Role & responsibilities

column1: Globiva is hiring Customer Support Associate For Multiple process II
column2: Call to HR for Appointment @   Mr.Khushi Rajput +91-78170-00484 (11am-5pm)     Job Description:  Globiva, a dynamic and leading outsourcing service provider, is seeking dedicated individuals to join our team as Customer Relationship Executives for multiple process at our Gurgaon location. This is a fantastic opportunity for both freshers and experienced candidates who possess excellent communication skills and a passion for customer service. Process:   RBL SOTC MMT Key Responsibilities:   Customer Interaction:  Engage with customers in a professional and courteous manner, addressing their queries and concerns, and providing solutions effectively. Documentation:  Maintain accurate and detailed records of customer interactions, transactions, and other relevant information. Product Knowledge : Stay informed about the process and related services to provide accurate information to customers. Problem Resolution:  Handle and resolve customer complaints, escalating issues when necessary to ensure a high level of customer satisfaction. Adherence to Policies:  Ensure compliance with company policies, procedures, and guidelines in all customer interactions. Team Collaboration:  Work collaboratively with team members and other departments to enhance overall customer experience. Education and Experience: High school diploma or equivalent 0-2 years of customer service or retail experience preferred Ability to effectively communicate in person, over the phone, and via email Skills and Abilities : Excellent communication and interpersonal skills Strong active listening and problem-solving abilities Patience and empathy when dealing with customer inquiries and concerns Familiarity with customer service software and databases Proficiency with basic computer programs like word processing and spreadsheets Ability to work well under pressure and meet deadlines Willingness to work in a fast-paced, customer-oriented environment Interview Process:  Face-to-face interviews will be conducted. The salary offered may vary based on the quality of the interview.  Compensation:   Up to 17,000 INR for fresher candidates Up to 25,000 INR for experienced candidates   Globiva is an equal opportunity employer, and we encourage candidates from diverse backgrounds to apply. Note: The salary mentioned are indicative and subject to change based on the interview performance and overall candidate evaluation

column2: Customer Engagement: Actively engage with customers through various channels such as phone calls, emails, social media, or in-person meetings     Listen to their inquiries, concerns, and feedback, and provide prompt and helpful responses     Customer Support: Assist customers in resolving issues, answering questions, and providing solutions to problems     You may work closely with other departments or teams to ensure the timely resolution of customer queries     Relationship Building: Develop strong relationships with customers by understanding their needs and preferences     Tailor your interactions to address their individual requirements and preferences     Upselling and Cross-selling: Identify opportunities to upsell or cross-sell products or services that align with the customer's needs and preferences     However, it's important to do so in a helpful and non-pushy manner     Customer Feedback: Gather and analyze customer feedback to gain insights into their satisfaction levels and areas of improvement     Relay this information to relevant departments to make necessary changes and improvements       ?

column2: Desired experience:    Minimum 1 years of relevant experience in Customer Care     Key Role Responsibilities:       The company is currently seeking executives who will assist us in delivering high-quality customer satisfaction by handling issues, follow-up, escalating and resolving issues in a timely fashion.         He/she would be the primary point of contact for the escalation of acute support delivery experience concerns. The ideal candidate should be able to prioritize high-impact customers and address their concerns primarily while documenting all interactions in the CRM, as per department guidelines.         The ideal candidate should coordinate across all departments to attend to the queries of the company s customers and partners. The executive should regularly communicate with assigned customers and partners. He/she should comply with all privacy and data security policies and practices.         In addition to the above skill set, the executive should be a quick learner, multi-tasker, and critical thinker, have excellent problem-solving skills, and be able to work well with a team and individually.         The executive should have exceptional written and verbal communication skills.         He/she Should be well-versed in English and Hindi language. Knowledge in Bengali, Tamil, and Kannada Telugu language will be an added advantage.

column2: SUMMARY        Job title: Inbound Telecaller (B2B) Location: Kolkata, India Employment Type: Full-time            Key Responsibilities: -Handling Inbound Calls: Manage incoming calls from B2B clients, providing them with information about our products/services. - Customer Assistance: Assist clients with inquiries, product information, pricing, and order status. - Order Processing: Receive and process orders from B2B clients, ensuring accuracy and efficient clients.            Job Title: Outbound Telecaller Job Location: Kolkata Job type: On-site, full time            Job responsibilities: Customer Outreach: Initiate and manage outbound calls to prospective and current customers to introduce and promote products or services. Engagement and Relationship Building: Establish rapport with customers, understand their needs, and provide relevant information to encourage sales or collect feedback. Data Entry and Management: Accurately record customer information, call details, and feedback in the CRM system.              Requirements    Education: Bachelor's degree. - Experience: Previous experience in a customer service or call center role; experience in a B2B environment is preferred. - Communication: Excellent verbal and written communication skills in English, Hindi and Bengali. - Customer-Oriented: Strong customer service skills with the ability to build positive relationships. - Problem-Solving: Ability to resolve issues effectively and efficiently. - Organizational Skills: Strong attention to detail and ability to manage multiple tasks          Benefits  Competitive salary and performance recognitions. - Professional development and training opportunities. - A supportive and collaborative work environment. - Statutory Benefits

column2: EQUINITI ICS India Pvt Ltd is looking for Customer Experience Executive - Voice Process to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey      The Customer Experience Executive - Voice Process will be responsible for providing high-quality customer service and support via telephone interactions      This role requires excellent communication skills, a customer-centric approach, and the ability to handle inquiries and resolve issues effectively and efficiently        Key Responsibilities:        Handle inbound and outbound calls from customers regarding product inquiries, order status, billing questions, and general support      Listen actively to customers, understand their needs, and provide accurate information and assistance in a professional manner      Effectively address customer concerns, complaints, and escalations, ensuring timely resolution and customer satisfaction      Maintain detailed and accurate records of customer interactions and transactions in the CRM system      Collaborate with cross-functional teams to resolve complex customer issues and improve overall service delivery      Identify opportunities to upsell or cross-sell products and services based on customer needs and preferences      Stay updated on product features, promotions, and company policies to provide accurate information to customers      Adhere to established service level agreements (SLAs) and quality standards to meet or exceed performance targets      Participate in ongoing training and development programs to enhance product knowledge and customer service skills      Contribute to a positive team environment by sharing best practices, providing feedback, and supporting colleagues as needed

column2: The Field Scientific Officer is responsible for maintaining and expanding business operations and relationships within the designated region       Responsibility/Deliverables:       The Field Scientific Officer is not just responsible for sales, but also for acquiring new clients and traveling within the region to collaborate with the sales team and other sales managers to assess progress and strategize new sales objectives     Their role includes planning and executing meetings with potential clients and achieving set sales targets     Task & Activities:Collaborate extensively with the Product Team to create scientific content, marketing materials, and establish Key Opinion Leaders (KOL)     Engage in scientific conferences, organize CME sessions, and host roundtable conferences with stakeholders     Visit prospective and current clients in designated sales regions to introduce our company's products and services, as well as to enhance our brand recognition     Develop innovative and effective sales and marketing strategies for the assigned product portfolio to drive revenue growth     Learning all about the products/services assigned to them & presenting products/services with technical competence     Complete the sales cycle starting from generating an inquiry to receiving payments     Collecting customer feedback and providing updates to senior management     Maintain and update the CRM system daily with accurate and relevant information, ensuring that customer interactions are well-documented     Be prepared for up to 70% travel time to meet with clients       Key Competencies:       Experience in selling genomics products would be an added advantage     Good knowledge of Next Generation SequencingStrong knowledge of Molecular Biology Reagents and techniquesGood knowledge of Institutional/Diagnostic SalesGood verbal and written communication skillsProficient in MS Word, Excel, and PowerPoint       Experience:       o3 ??5 Yrsin the sale of Molecular Biology Reagents, lab chemicals, Diagnostic kits, NGS kits     Qualification:oMSc /BSc In Molecular Biology /Biotech/Biology/Biochem

column2: Lead Generation and Sales:              Conduct outbound calls to prospective customers to generate leads and promote products or services.          Follow up on leads generated through marketing campaigns, website inquiries, and other channels to qualify prospects and convert them into sales opportunities.          Achieve individual and team sales targets by effectively communicating product features, benefits, and pricing to potential customers.              Customer Service and Support:              Handle inbound calls from existing customers, providing assistance, resolving inquiries, and addressing concerns in a professional and timely manner.          Build rapport and establish positive relationships with customers to enhance satisfaction and loyalty.          Escalate complex issues or unresolved customer complaints to appropriate channels for resolution.              Team Leadership and Supervision:              Lead and supervise a team of telecallers, providing guidance, coaching, and performance feedback to drive productivity and results.          Monitor and evaluate team performance, including call quality, conversion rates, and adherence to scripts and protocols.          Conduct regular training sessions and workshops to enhance the skills and knowledge of team members.              Call Center Operations:              Ensure the smooth operation of the call center, including managing call queues, scheduling shifts, and optimizing staffing levels to meet service level agreements (SLAs).          Monitor call volumes, handle overflow calls during peak periods, and implement strategies to minimize wait times and maximize efficiency.          Maintain accurate records of calls, sales transactions, and customer interactions using CRM software or call center management systems.          Reporting and Analysis:          Generate reports and analyze call center metrics, including call volume, response times, and conversion rates, to identify trends, areas for improvement, and opportunities for optimization.          Provide regular updates and insights to management on team performance, sales trends, and customer feedback.            Freshers or Experience in Tele calling.

column2: Key Responsibilities: Customer Contact:  Proactively reach out to customers via phone calls to address inquiries, resolve issues, and provide information about products and services. Sales:  Identify customer needs and opportunities to upsell or cross-sell products and services, contributing to the company's revenue growth. Support:  Assist customers with product-related questions, troubleshooting, and provide timely solutions to their problems. Relationship Building:  Establish and maintain strong relationships with customers to ensure repeat business and customer loyalty. Communication:  Effectively communicate in both Hindi and English, ensuring clear and professional interactions with diverse customer groups. Feedback:  Gather and relay customer feedback to the relevant departments to improve products, services, and customer experience. Documentation:  Maintain accurate records of customer interactions, transactions, comments, and complaints using our CRM system. Team Collaboration:  Work closely with the sales and customer service teams to achieve company goals and objectives. Qualifications: Language Proficiency:  Fluent in both Hindi and English, with excellent verbal and written communication skills. Experience:  Previous experience in customer support, sales, or a related field is preferred. Interpersonal Skills:  Strong interpersonal skills with the ability to build rapport and trust with customers. Problem-Solving:  Ability to think critically and resolve customer issues effectively and efficiently. Organizational Skills:  Highly organized with the ability to manage multiple tasks and priorities. Tech-Savvy:  Comfortable using CRM systems and other sales and customer support software. Education:   We Prefer Skills Over Study.

The role we are keen to discuss with you is with a world Leading Healthcare Organization based in the U.S. and the work will be part of Revenue Cycle Management and Accounts Receivable. The exciting daily role will also include: Analyze medical insurance claims. Resolve moderate and routine queries as per practice. Support Revenue Cycle and Denial Management workflows Research on routine customer inquiries All you require is: Graduation Degree in any stream Eagerness to learn and grow working along with fun-loving colleagues. Fluent in spoken and written English, you will be communicating with folks from the land of Hollywood! Flair for speech, finesse, time management  not too much to ask for! Since you live your life on these rules! What do you get in return? Industry-wide best of Medical and Insurance Benefits ??talk to us to know more! Variable Incentive pay ????ard Work Pays????heard about this before! What you need to do next: Apply to this job with details ??easy as it goes. column2: MEDIHOME FAMILY CLINIC PVT LTD is looking for Tele caller to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey          Outbound Calls:Telecallers make outbound calls to reach out to potential clients, customers, or leads      They may promote products, services, or special offers, and aim to generate interest or close sales              Inbound Calls:Telecallers also handle inbound calls, addressing inquiries, providing information, and assisting customers with their needs              Sales and Lead Generation:One of the primary functions of a Telecaller is to generate sales leads by identifying potential customers and gathering relevant information for follow-up by sales teams              Customer Service:Telecallers provide customer support by addressing queries, resolving issues, and providing assistance to existing customers              Surveys and Feedback:They conduct surveys to gather feedback from customers, which can be used to improve products, services, or customer experience              Appointment Scheduling:Tele Callers may schedule appointments, meetings, or demos for sales representatives or other departments              Script Adherence:They often follow prepared scripts to ensure consistent and accurate communication with customers

column2: Job Title:* Customer Support Executive *Company:* NCR Education Services *Location:* Remote *Work Schedule:* 5 Days Working, Night Shift (12:30 AM - 9:30 AM), Rotational Shifts *Experience Required:* Minimum 1 Year *Preferred Experience:* - International Customer Support - EdTech Industry *Joining Date:* Immediate Job Description *About NCR Education Services:* NCR Education Services is a leading provider of educational solutions, committed to delivering high-quality education services globally. We specialize in innovative learning solutions that cater to a diverse range of learners. *Position Overview:* We are looking for a dedicated and proactive Customer Support Executive to join our remote team. This role involves providing exceptional customer support through live session monitoring, ticket processing, and live chats. The ideal candidate should possess excellent communication skills and have at least one year of experience in a customer support role. Preference will be given to candidates with international experience and a background in the EdTech industry. Key Responsibilities: - *Live Session Monitoring:* Oversee and manage live educational sessions to ensure they run smoothly and address any technical or participant issues promptly. - *Ticket Processing:* Handle and resolve customer support tickets efficiently, ensuring timely responses and solutions to customer inquiries and issues. - *Live Chats:* Engage with customers through live chat to provide real-time support and resolve any queries or concerns they may have. - Maintain a high level of professionalism and customer service standards to enhance customer satisfaction. - Collaborate with other support team members and departments to improve service delivery and customer experience. - Document and escalate issues to the appropriate teams when necessary. Qualifications: - Minimum of one year of experience in a customer support role. - Excellent verbal and written communication skills. - Ability to work night shifts (12:30 AM - 9:30 AM) and adapt to rotational shifts as required. - Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to handle challenging situations with ease. - Experience in international customer support is preferred. - Experience in the EdTech industry is a plus. - Immediate availability for joining is a must. Benefits: - Work remotely from the comfort of your home. - Five-day workweek. - Opportunity to work with a dynamic and international team. - Competitive salary and benefits package. If you are a motivated and customer-focused individual looking to join a forward-thinking company, we encourage you to apply for this exciting opportunity at NCR Education Services.  *How to Apply:* Interested candidates are invited to submit their resume and a cover letter detailing their relevant experience and why they are a good fit for this role to rinkal.premwani@jobors.com NCR Education Services is an equal opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees.

Email:- ritek.home@gmail.com  WhatsApp Number:-     7303901862    for Immediate offer     Customer Inquiries:   Responding to customer inquiries promptly and effectively, whether they are related to products, services, or general information. 2.  Issue Resolution:   Resolving customer issues, complaints, or concerns in a timely and satisfactory manner to ensure a positive customer experience. 3.  Communication Skills:  Demonstrating excellent verbal and written communication skills to interact with customers professionally and effectively. 4.  Product/Service Knowledge:  Maintaining a deep understanding of the company's products or services to provide accurate information and assistance to customers. 5.  Order Processing:  Handling order-related tasks, including order placement, tracking, cancellations, and addressing any issues related to the ordering process. 6.  Technical Support:  Providing basic technical support or troubleshooting assistance to customers, or escalating technical issues to the appropriate teams. 7.  Customer Education:  Educating customers about product features, service offerings, and providing guidance on how to make the best use of the products or services. 8.  Feedback Collection:  Collecting customer feedback, suggestions, and complaints to help the company understand customer needs and areas for improvement. 9.  Record Keeping:  Maintaining accurate records of customer interactions, feedback, and relevant details to track customer history and aid in future interactions. 10.  Adherence to Policies:  Adhering to company policies and procedures, ensuring that all interactions with customers align with the organization's standards and values. Role & responsibilities   Kindly share your Profile on shivani@thehrsolutions.in

column1: BPO Hiring/Voice process/Salary Upto 4.2LPA/Bangalore/Work from Office
column2: Hello Applicant, Greetings from The Job Factory, Position: Customer Support Executive - International Voice Process Location: Bangalore Job Type: Full-Time  Salary: Upto 420,000 per annum Contact Information HR Swathi @ 9972829563 ( Call or Whatsapp ) Email ID : swathi@thejobfactory.co.in Job Summary: We are seeking a dedicated and enthusiastic Customer Support Executive to join our International Voice Process team. The ideal candidate will have excellent communication skills, a customer-centric approach, and the ability to resolve customer inquiries and issues efficiently. Key Responsibilities: Handle inbound and outbound calls from international customers, providing timely and accurate information. Resolve customer complaints and issues, ensuring a high level of customer satisfaction. Assist customers with product and service inquiries, troubleshooting, and support. Maintain detailed records of customer interactions and transactions. Requirements: undergraduates or graduates Proven experience in a customer support role, particularly in an international voice process. Excellent verbal communication skills in English; additional language proficiency is a plus. Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to think on your feet. Preferred Qualifications: Experience in a call center or customer service environment or freshers can also apply What We Offer: Competitive salary upto 420,000 per annum and performance-based incentives. Comprehensive training and development programs. Opportunities for career advancement within the company. A dynamic and supportive work environment. Benefits package including health insurance, paid time off, and more. How to Apply: Interested candidates are invited to submit their resume and a cover letter detailing their relevant experience and why they are a good fit for this role to below details. Contact Information HR Swathi @ 9972829563 ( Call or Whatsapp ) Email ID : swathi@thejobfactory.co.in

column1: NIIT is hiring For senior  Training Coordinator
column2: Training Coordinator role with NIIT Graduates need to apply (B.A. / B.Com / BBA / BHM /B.Sc., BCA), B. Tech (Mech/Biotech) can apply. Distance P.G can apply  ,  BE /MCA are not eligible, PGDM can apply Working knowledge of computers,  In Night shifts Night Allowances will be provided. Excellent Written & Verbal communication skills.  Responsibilities: The role involves providing 24*5 Training Administration support to top companies in the EMEA, NAM & APAC region.  Assist the customers with the Training Administration issue/E-mail Provide the customer with resolutions / Training scheduling options  Gather additional information about reported issue  Perform detailed case analysis and document the case in the system and generate ticket  Generate daily / weekly reports for the customer on Microsoft Excel  Perform Training Management activities on the Learning Management Systems.    Interested candidates and Placement cells of colleges can also reach at  Jasleen.2.Kaur@niitmts.com Contact Details- 7042458078 NIIT is an equal opportunity employer. We evaluate qualified applicants without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability, veteran status, or any other protected characteristic.
